animations.name: Fade Out
animations.css: @keyframes fade-out { from { opacity: 1; } to { opacity: 0; } } .fade-out { animation: fade-out 1s ease-in-out; }

animations.name: Slide Out
animations.css: @keyframes slide-out { from { transform: translateY(0); opacity: 1; } to { transform: translateY(100px); opacity: 0; } } .slide-out { animation: slide-out 1s ease-in-out; }
